cnbc.title: While AI spending is top of mind, online ads are driving a lot of Big Tech's growth
cnbc.summary: Meta, Amazon, Alphabet and Microsoft reported quarterly earnings that showed rising digital ad sales and increased AI infrastructure spending.

cnbc.title: Trump administration must pay SNAP benefits despite government shutdown, judge rules
cnbc.summary: The Justice Department argued that the food stamp program, which feeds more than 40 million Americans, effectively did not exist anymore due to the shutdown.

cnbc.title: Berkshire's operating earnings jump 34%, Buffett buys back no stock and raises cash hoard to $381 billion
cnbc.summary: Berkshire's operating profit generated from the conglomerate's wholly owned businesses including insurance and railroads jumped 34% in the third quarter.

cnbc.title: Microsoft plans to hire more but with 'a lot more leverage' thanks to AI, CEO Satya Nadella says
cnbc.summary: The company wants to ensure that all of its employees can access its Microsoft 365 and GitHub Copilot artificial intelligence tools, CEO Satya Nadella said.

cnbc.title: Millions face 'huge sticker shock' when ACA open enrollment starts Nov. 1
cnbc.summary: Millions of households logging on to enroll in a health plan via the Affordable Care Act marketplace will see much higher premiums.

cnbc.title: Evolve Bank CEO fired after propositioning FBI agent who pretended to be a teen boy
cnbc.summary: In August, Evolve hired Hartheimer, who brought experience in financial regulatory matters, to help the bank recover from the collapse of startup Synapse.

cnbc.title: 'Trump effect' raises hopes for cannabis rally as investors bet on federal reforms, softer marijuana stance
cnbc.summary: Cannabis stocks could rally on hopes for new hemp regulations and Trump's possible softer stance on marijuana, fueling investor optimism across the industry.

cnbc.title: Where the Nexperia auto chip crisis stands now as the U.S., China and EU race to contain fallout
cnbc.summary: The Nexperia crisis is still threatening vehicle production worldwide.

cnbc.title: Musk teases Tesla Roadster demo by year-end. He's been hyping a new one since 2017
cnbc.summary: Tesla's Elon Musk told Joe Rogan that his company is aiming to develop a redesigned version of the Roadster before the end of the year.

cnbc.title: Trump touts marble Lincoln Bathroom remodel amid government shutdown
cnbc.summary: Trump's bathroom update follows his major makeover of the Oval Office, and the demolition of the White House East Wing, to be replaced by a large ballroom.
